Title: A Text Filtering Based Approach to Classify Bug Injected and Fixed Changes
Published: International Conference on Advanced Applied Informatics
Elements_risk_assessment: We assume that faults are reported just after they are injected in the software
Summary: To predict bug inducing changes by using source code differences of bug inducing changes and previous changes and a text filtering technique
Outcome:
the recall fell a little, and precision and F 1 value improved a little. In particular, the granularity of prediction is finer, and
    the accuracy of prediction is higher.
